snippet.title: Downward Spiral: Horus Station - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Downward Spiral: Horus Station is a mysterious and atmospheric zero gravity thriller set in the lost and forgotten Horus Station for PC on May 31st and PS4™ Summer 2018 with optional PS VR, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift Touch and Windows Mixed Reality support. Use the ship's maintenance hardware -- like bolt throwers, rail guns, and arc welders -- to take out threats, solve puzzles and find the truth of why Horus Station has been left drifting in space, accompanied by the electronic ambient soundtrack composed by platinum selling HIM frontman Ville Valo.

Follow us here for more information first:
Steam Wishlist here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/690620/Downward_Spiral_Horus_Station/
Home Page: https://www.downwardspiralgame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/3rdeyestudios/
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/3rdeyestudiosfi

© 2018 3rd Eye Studios. Downward Spiral™ is a trademark of 3rd Eye Studios. All other trademarks cited herein are the property of their respective owners.
